description:
You need to learn HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery to become a web developer. This course will exactly teach all these new skills to become a good web developer. This course also teach how to use bootstrap framework which is the most popular responsive framework on the internet. In this course, you will also learn web design guideline, which you can apply to real world website. 

This course will first give basic understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery and Bootstrap framework then by combining all these skills you will be able to build a modern looking website which will look great on all the small and wide screen. 

In this course, you will learn how to optimize the web site so it would load fast.
title: Build Responsive Website Using HTML5, CSS3, JS And Bootstrap
